general_advisory: Farmers are advised to avoid irrigation and spraying operations during periods of expected rainfall. Take precautions to support crops during high wind conditions.

advisory: Complete nursery sowing by end of 2nd fortnight of July.
Use pheromone traps for monitoring stem borer and leaf folder infestation.
Recommendations for main field land preparation and fertilization.
Transplanting guidelines for high yielding varieties and hybrids.
Ideal sowing time and seed treatment recommendations.
Weed control measures and precautions for spraying operations during rainfall forecasts.
Preparing raised bed nursery for kharif vegetable crops.
Avoid planting and intercultural operations during periods of expected rainfall.
Ensure deworming and vaccination of animals during rainy season.
Take precautions against infectious diseases due to increase in mosquitoes and flies.
Provide clean drinking water and safe shelter for animals.
